Detailed Description

Class responsible for computing the radiative heat flux of the surface assuming it is grey body.

The incoming gas radiation can be considered as an input to the balance by setting the surface feature gas_phase_radiation to true and by calling the gasRadiativeHeatFlux function. If the option gas_phase_radiation is set to false, then the gas phase radiation is either completely neglected or it can be considered equal to the black body radiation at a temperature, an assumption which is not recommended.
